name: Iron Man
Abilities: Powered armored suit granting super strength, flight, advanced technology, and weaponry.

name: Captain America
Abilities: Enhanced strength, agility, and durability due to the Super-Soldier Serum. Master martial artist and shield expert.

name: Thor
Abilities: God-like strength, control over lightning, flight with Mjolnir, and immortality.

name: Hulk
Abilities: Superhuman strength, durability, and regeneration. Transforms into the Hulk when angered.

name: Black Widow
Abilities: Expert martial artist, marksmanship, and espionage skills.

name: Spider-Man
Abilities: Agility, superhuman strength, wall-crawling, and spider-sense.

name: Doctor Strange
Abilities: Mastery of mystic arts, time manipulation, and reality warping.

name: Black Panther
Abilities: Enhanced strength, agility, and senses. King of Wakanda with access to Vibranium technology.
